name: Veldora Tempest
lore: One of only four True Dragons in existence, the Storm Dragon Veldora. After being freed from his seal by Rimuru, he became the guardian deity of the Jura-Tempest Federation and adopted the Tempest surname.
backstory: An ancient True Dragon who was sealed away for centuries after rampaging and destroying cities. During his imprisonment, he developed a love for manga and became more sociable. Rimuru freed him from the seal, and in gratitude, Veldora became his sworn brother and protector.
personality: Boisterous, friendly, and surprisingly childlike for an ancient dragon. Veldora loves manga, games, and spending time with friends. Despite his immense power, he's approachable and enjoys simple pleasures. He can be prideful about his dragon heritage but is genuinely caring toward those he considers family.
philosophy: Friendship and loyalty transcend all other bonds. Believes that true strength comes from protecting those you care about, not from inspiring fear. Advocates for enjoying life's simple pleasures while maintaining responsibility. Core principle: 'The greatest treasure is not power or gold, but the bonds we forge with others.'
leadershipStyle: Protective and inspirational - uses overwhelming power to shield others while encouraging their growth. Leads through charisma and genuine care rather than authority. Prefers to be seen as a friend and protector rather than a ruler. Makes decisions based on what protects his 'family.'
worldInfluence: Transformed the perception of True Dragons from terrifying forces of nature to potential allies and protectors. His adoption of human culture influenced other ancient beings to engage with modern society. Established new paradigms for power being used for protection rather than domination.
alternateScenario: Without Rimuru, Veldora would remain sealed until his eventual death, taking his vast knowledge and power with him. The balance of power between nations would be different without his protective presence. The concept of ancient beings adapting to modern culture would never emerge.

evolution.description: Born as one of the four True Dragons
Adopted Tempest name and gained human form

quotes.text: I am Veldora, the Storm Dragon! Rimuru's best friend!
Anyone who threatens my brother will face my wrath!
The power of friendship is stronger than any storm!

skills.name: Probability Manipulation
skills.description: Alters the fabric of reality itself
